content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Friday May 2, 2025 

Today is an “A” Day 

  • 6th Grade Project Lift is meeting in the Large Group room today during Flex. 

 

  • We’re back again this morning to dish out some Bucks by the Boatload. Teachers, please have your LiveSchool accounts ready! Today we will award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who does not have their cell phone on them. Remember, cell phones should be in your backpack, locker, or left at home. Students – keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

 

  • Today’s lunch is pizza, Cassar salad, and strawberry applesauce. 

 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
